lead_paragraph: Tomas Tatar scored with 2:50 left in the third period to lift the Detroit Red Wings to a 4-3 win over the Buffalo Sabres on Saturday.

headline.print_headline: Red Wings Slip Past Sabres for 4-3 Win
headline.main: Red Wings Slip Past Sabres for 4-3 Win
